post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, November 20
post.Content:
A small list of links this week, but I hope you enjoy nonetheless :-)

  • Gerrit Grunwald has another 'Friday Fun Component' - this time horizon charts written in JavaFX - very cool! Gerrit also put out a new release of tilesfx.
  • David Gilbert has made a new release of Orson Charts (a 3D chart library for the Java platform) along with a separate project Orson Charts FX for the extensions required to run the code in JavaFX.
  • J. Toiviainen has written about writing Pong in JavaFX.
